smart_goals.description: Reduce carbohydrate intake to 45-60 grams per meal and track daily carb consumption using a food diary for the next 30 days
Perform high-intensity interval training (HIIT) exercises 3 times per week, with each session lasting 20-30 minutes, for the next 8 weeks
Include a protein source in each main meal (breakfast, lunch, dinner) and track protein intake using a food log for the next 4 weeks
Exercise regularly by completing at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity spread across 5 days per week
